iti71:2.1: “Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana.
iti71:2.2: Te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna.
iti71:3.1: Tam kho panaham, bhikkhave, nannassa samanassa va brahmanassa va sutva vadami.
iti71:3.2: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana.
iti71:3.3: Te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna.
iti71:3.4: Api ca, bhikkhave, yadeva samam natam samam dittham samam viditam tadevaham vadami.
iti71:4.1: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana.
iti71:4.2: Te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna”ti.
iti71:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
